document_data.name: Drisinil Barrison Del'Armgo
document_data.mainbody: '''Drisinil Barrison Del'Armgo''' was a novice priestess of [[Lolth]] at [[Arach-Tinilith]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] and a member of [[House Barrison Del'Armgo]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Drisinil was described as tall. She had a sharp nose and green eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, she snuck out of [[Tier Breche]] and was punished for it by being forced to cut her own little fingers off. in order to have her bring her fellow conspirators to an unused classroom in Arach-Tinilith, where she summoned hordes of spiders that slayed them. During the coup, Drisinil killed her aunt and instructor [[Molvayas Barrison Del'Armgo]], claiming that Molvayas would have betrayed them to Quenthel. As punishment for the plot, Drisinil was allowed to live but her remaining fingers and tongue were cut off.
